verses.verse: Now these are the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> and the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> that went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with Z'rubavel <S%H2216><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shealtiel <S%H7597><s%>, and Jeshua <S%H3442><s%>: Seraiah <S%H8304><s%>, Yirmeyah-yahu <S%H3414><s%>, Ezra <S%H5830><s%>,
Amariah <S%H568><s%>, Malluch <S%H4409><s%>, Hattush <S%H2407><s%>,
Shechaniah <S%H7935><s%>, Rehum <S%H7348><s%>, Meremoth <S%H4822><s%>,
Iddo <S%H5714><s%>, Ginnetho <S%H1599><s%>, AbiYAH <S%H29><s%>,
Miamin <S%H4326><s%>, Maadiah <S%H4573><s%>, Bilgah <S%H1083><s%>,
Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%>, and Joiarib <S%H3114><s%>, Jedaiah <S%H3048><s%>,

Sallu <S%H5543><s%>, Amok <S%H5987><s%>, Hilkiah <S%H2518><s%>, Jedaiah <S%H3048><s%>. These were the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> and of their brethren <S%H251><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Jeshua <S%H3442><s%>.

Moreover the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%>: Jeshua <S%H3442><s%>, Binnui <S%H1131><s%>, Kadmiel <S%H6934><s%>, Sherebiah <S%H8274><s%>, Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and Mattaniah <S%H4983><s%>, which was over the thanksgiving <S%H1960><s%>, he and his brethren <S%H251><s%>.
Also Bakbukiah <S%H1229><s%> and Unni <S%H6042><s%>, their brethren <S%H251><s%>, were over against them in the watches <S%H4931><s%>.

And Jeshua <S%H3442><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8689><s%> Joiakim <S%H3113><s%>, Joiakim <S%H3113><s%> also begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8689><s%> Eliyahhib <S%H475><s%>, and Eliyahhib <S%H475><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8689><s%> Joiada <S%H3111><s%>,
And Joiada <S%H3111><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8689><s%> Y'honatan <S%H3129><s%>, and Y'honatan <S%H3129><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8689><s%> Jaddua <S%H3037><s%>.

And in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Joiakim <S%H3113><s%> were Kohanim <S%H3548><s%>, the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>: of Seraiah <S%H8304><s%>, Meraiah <S%H4811><s%>; of Yirmeyah-yahu <S%H3414><s%>, Hananiah <S%H2608><s%>;
Of Ezra <S%H5830><s%>, Meshullam <S%H4918><s%>; of Amariah <S%H568><s%>, Jehohanan <S%H3076><s%>;
Of Melicu <S%H4409><s%>, Y'honatan <S%H3129><s%>; of SH'vaniah <S%H7645><s%>, Yosef <S%H3130><s%>;
Of Harim <S%H2766><s%>, Adna <S%H5733><s%>; of Meraioth <S%H4812><s%>, Helkai <S%H2517><s%>;
Of Iddo <S%H5714><s%>, Z'kharyah-yahu <S%H2148><s%>; of Ginnethon <S%H1599><s%>, Meshullam <S%H4918><s%>;
Of AbiYAH <S%H29><s%>, Zichri <S%H2147><s%>; of Miniamin <S%H4509><s%>, of Moadiah <S%H4153><s%>, Piltai <S%H6408><s%>;
Of Bilgah <S%H1083><s%>, Shammua <S%H8051><s%>; of Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%>, Jehonathan <S%H3083><s%>;
And of Joiarib <S%H3114><s%>, Mattenai <S%H4982><s%>; of Jedaiah <S%H3048><s%>, Uzzi <S%H5813><s%>;
Of Sallai <S%H5543><s%>, Kallai <S%H7040><s%>; of Amok <S%H5987><s%>, Eber <S%H5677><s%>;
Of Hilkiah <S%H2518><s%>, Hashabiah <S%H2811><s%>; of Jedaiah <S%H3048><s%>, Nethaneel <S%H5417><s%>.

The L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Eliyahhib <S%H475><s%>, Joiada <S%H3111><s%>, and Johanan <S%H3110><s%>, and Jaddua <S%H3037><s%>, were recorded <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8803><s%> chief <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>: also the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%>, to the reign <S%H4438><s%> of Darius <S%H1867><s%> the Persian <S%H6542><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>, the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>, were written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the chronicles <S%H1697><s%>, even until the days <S%H3117><s%> of Johanan <S%H3110><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eliyahhib <S%H475><s%>.

And the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%>: Hashabiah <S%H2811><s%>, Sherebiah <S%H8274><s%>, and Jeshua <S%H3442><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kadmiel <S%H6934><s%>, with their brethren <S%H251><s%> over against them, to praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8763><s%> and to give thanks <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, according to the Mitzvah <S%H4687><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, ward <S%H4929><s%> over against <S%H5980><s%> ward <S%H4929><s%>.

Mattaniah <S%H4983><s%>, and Bakbukiah <S%H1229><s%>, `Ovadyah-yahu <S%H5662><s%>, Meshullam <S%H4918><s%>, Talmon <S%H2929><s%>, Akkub <S%H6126><s%>, were porters <S%H7778><s%> keeping <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the ward <S%H4929><s%> at the thresholds <S%H624><s%> of the gates <S%H8179><s%>.

These were in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Joiakim <S%H3113><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeshua <S%H3442><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jozadak <S%H3136><s%>, and in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Nechemyah <S%H5166><s%> the governor <S%H6346><s%>, and of Ezra <S%H5830><s%> the Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, the scribe <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

And at the dedication <S%H2598><s%> of the wall <S%H2346><s%> of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> they sought <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> out of all their places <S%H4725><s%>, to bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8687><s%> them to Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, to keep <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the dedication <S%H2598><s%> with gladness <S%H8057><s%>, both with thanksgivings <S%H8426><s%>, and with singing <S%H7892><s%>, with cymbals <S%H4700><s%>, psalteries <S%H5035><s%>, and with harps <S%H3658><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the singers <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8789><s%> gathered themselves together <S%H622><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, both out of the plain country <S%H3603><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, and from the villages <S%H2691><s%> of Netophathi <S%H5200><s%>;

Also from the house <S%H1004><s%> of Gilgal <S%H1537><s%> <S%H8677><s%> <S%H1019><s%>, and out of the fields <S%H7704><s%> of Geba <S%H1387><s%> and Azmaveth <S%H5820><s%>: for the singers <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8789><s%> had builded <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them villages <S%H2691><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>.

And the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> and the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> purified <S%H2891><s%> <S%H8691><s%> themselves, and purified <S%H2891><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, and the gates <S%H8179><s%>, and the wall <S%H2346><s%>.

Then I brought up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> upon the wall <S%H2346><s%>, and appointed <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8686><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> companies of them that gave thanks <S%H8426><s%>, whereof one went <S%H8418><s%> on the right hand <S%H3225><s%> upon the wall <S%H2346><s%> toward the dung <S%H830><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>:
And after <S%H310><s%> them went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Hoshaiah <S%H1955><s%>, and half <S%H2677><s%> of the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>,
And Azariah <S%H5838><s%>, Ezra <S%H5830><s%>, and Meshullam <S%H4918><s%>,
Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and Binyamin <S%H1144><s%>, and Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%>, and Yirmeyah-yahu <S%H3414><s%>,

And certain of the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> ' sons <S%H1121><s%> with shofars <S%H2689><s%>; namely, Z'kharyah-yahu <S%H2148><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Y'honatan <S%H3129><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mattaniah <S%H4983><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Michaiah <S%H4320><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zaccur <S%H2139><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph <S%H623><s%>:

And his brethren <S%H251><s%>, Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%>, and Azarael <S%H5832><s%>, Milalai <S%H4450><s%>, Gilalai <S%H1562><s%>, Maai <S%H4597><s%>, Nethaneel <S%H5417><s%>, and Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, Hanani <S%H2607><s%>, with the musical <S%H7892><s%> instruments <S%H3627><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and Ezra <S%H5830><s%> the scribe <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them.

And at the fountain <S%H5869><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>, which was over against them, they went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> by the stairs <S%H4609><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, at the going up <S%H4608><s%> of the wall <S%H2346><s%>, above the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, even unto the water <S%H4325><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%>.

And the other <S%H8145><s%> company of them that gave thanks <S%H8426><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> them, and I after <S%H310><s%> them, and the half <S%H2677><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> upon the wall <S%H2346><s%>, from beyond the tower <S%H4026><s%> of the furnaces <S%H8574><s%> even unto the broad <S%H7342><s%> wall <S%H2346><s%>;

And from above the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Efrayim <S%H669><s%>, and above the old <S%H3465><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>, and above the fish <S%H1709><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>, and the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Hananeel <S%H2606><s%>, and the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Meah <S%H3968><s%>, even unto the sheep <S%H6629><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>: and they stood still <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the prison <S%H4307><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>.

So stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> companies of them that gave thanks <S%H8426><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and I, and the half <S%H2677><s%> of the rulers <S%H5461><s%> with me:

And the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%>; Eliakim <S%H471><s%>, Maaseiah <S%H4641><s%>, Miniamin <S%H4509><s%>, Michaiah <S%H4320><s%>, Elioenai <S%H454><s%>, Z'kharyah-yahu <S%H2148><s%>, and Hananiah <S%H2608><s%>, with shofars <S%H2689><s%>;

And Maaseiah <S%H4641><s%>, and Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%>, and Eleazar <S%H499><s%>, and Uzzi <S%H5813><s%>, and Jehohanan <S%H3076><s%>, and MalchiYAH <S%H4441><s%>, and Elam <S%H5867><s%>, and Ezer <S%H5829><s%>. And the singers <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8789><s%> sang loud <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, with Jezrahiah <S%H3156><s%> their overseer <S%H6496><s%>.

Also that day <S%H3117><s%> they offered <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8799><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> sacrifices <S%H2077><s%>, and rejoiced <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: for 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> had made them rejoice <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8765><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> joy <S%H8057><s%>: the wives <S%H802><s%> also and the children <S%H3206><s%> rejoiced <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: so that the joy <S%H8057><s%> of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> was heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8735><s%> even afar off <S%H7350><s%>.

And at that time <S%H3117><s%> were some <S%H582><s%> appointed <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8735><s%> over the chambers <S%H5393><s%> for the treasures <S%H214><s%>, for the offerings <S%H8641><s%>, for the firstfruits <S%H7225><s%>, and for the tithes <S%H4643><s%>, to gather <S%H3664><s%> <S%H8800><s%> into them out of the fields <S%H7704><s%> of the cities <S%H5892><s%> the portions <S%H4521><s%> of the Torah <S%H8451><s%> for the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> and L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%>: for Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> rejoiced <S%H8057><s%> for the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> and for the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> that waited <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

And both the singers <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8789><s%> and the porters <S%H7778><s%> kept <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the ward <S%H4931><s%> of their 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and the ward <S%H4931><s%> of the purification <S%H2893><s%>, according to the Mitzvah <S%H4687><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, and of SHlomo <S%H8010><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>.

For in the days <S%H3117><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> and Asaph <S%H623><s%> of old <S%H6924><s%> there were chief <S%H7218><s%> of the singers <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8789><s%>, and songs <S%H7892><s%> of praise <S%H8416><s%> and thanksgiving <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8687><s%> unto 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

And all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Z'rubavel <S%H2216><s%>, and in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Nechemyah <S%H5166><s%>, gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the portions <S%H4521><s%> of the singers <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8789><s%> and the porters <S%H7778><s%>, every day <S%H3117><s%> his portion <S%H1697><s%>: and they sanctified <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8688><s%> holy things unto the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%>; and the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> sanctified <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8688><s%> them unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Aharon <S%H175><s%>.
